title: League of Bots, now I get why Riot is trying to bring banned players back, there's no new ones
body:
I remember back in the day where an XP bot wasn't even a thing, the most you'd have to worry about in modes like ARAM are trolls purposefully doing relays into the enemy Towers.

Now though you'll be lucky to actually get half a team of real people, and I had the greatest of luck getting _**two**_ of these damn things in one of my games, they bought no items and just stood there doing nothing despite a fight going on around them until the enemy got around to circling them and beating them down while they stared off into space, and this isn't the 1st time I've seen this shit either. Now I finally understand why Riot is going through with this unbanning "experiment" they need to bring back players because they don't actually have new ones staying with the game when they first join.

Oof.

replies.body:
I have never seen a bot on my team in this game.

They only exist in _extremely_ low ELO, and they have always been there. Nothing new, just get out of the garbage dump.

There is no "unbanning experiment", just a huge overreaction to a handful of erroneous bans being reversed. That has always happened. Not to mention unbanning half a dozen people wont make any difference to the player base or profits..
